F

fil.sr1 - package fil.sr1
Contains the entry point related to the ServeurFtp project, the Main class.
fil.sr1.commandhandler - package fil.sr1.commandhandler
Contains the logic allowing us to associate the commands sent by the client to their respective logic/to their handler
fil.sr1.commandhandler.commands - package fil.sr1.commandhandler.commands
Contains all the implementations and logic related to the command received by the FTP server, one class equals one command
fil.sr1.common - package fil.sr1.common
Contains a collection of utilities (classes static, constants, enums) which can be use throughout the application
fil.sr1.exceptions - package fil.sr1.exceptions
Contains all custom exceptions related to ServeurFtp Project error handling
fil.sr1.implementation - package fil.sr1.implementation
Contains all the implementation/logics linked to the proper functioning of the FTP server.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class fil.sr1.Main
 
Main - Class in fil.sr1
Application entry point with 3 arguments : 1 - the path of the local repository of the FTP server (mandatory), 2 - the port number (mandatory), 3 - the number of users who can connect simultaneously, this number is 5 by default (optionnal)
